verses.name: Ezekiel 13:11
verses.text: Say unto them which daub it with untempered morter, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing shower; and ye, O great hailstones, shall fall; and a stormy wind shall rend it.

verses.name: Ezekiel 13:12
verses.text: Lo, when the wall is fallen, shall it not be said unto you, Where is the daubing wherewith ye have daubed it?

verses.name: Ezekiel 13:13
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; I will even rend it with a stormy wind in my fury; and there shall be an overflowing shower in mine anger, and great hailstones in my fury to consume it.
